name: Grimsonland
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Grimsonland - This is a dynamic shooter in which you have to destroy the mutants. The hero needs to pass the main giant mutants every 3 levels.
In the game you meet 7 different types of mutants and 4 types of weapons. Each level is passed through a certain teleport at the end of the map. In the gameplay you will need to collect ammunition for your various guns and additional first-aid kits.

Meet face to face with crowds of enemies. Who will do everything so that you do not reach the coveted teleport and did not destroy their deity!

★ Several types of weapons
★ Simple and beautiful graphics
★ Dynamic shooting
★ Difficult gameplay
★ Many enemies
★ Original soundtrack

It all depends on you!
